alert.note: Alert for Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 2:41AM EST until December 21 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches...with locally heavier amounts possible. * WHERE...Western Mackinac County. * WHEN...From noon today to 8 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reductions in visibility. High snowfall rates in excess of 1" per hour will be possible during the evening commute, leading to quick snow accumulations on roadways. Hazardous travel conditions are expected, especially along US-2.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
